(Also, Ryo, the Ark is caved in.  I don't think you could just walk in there 
and start fixing crap...and there wouldn't be enough scrap at the Ark to 
build a CR chamber, let alone an autogun.  You may want to get supplies from 
the Cybertronian Fire)
